name: Chimera Crusader: Defender of Dominicus
description:
King Dominicus orders his top Paladin to slay the terrible Chimera. But it's going to take some grinding. They'll have to build up strength by slaying everything else in their path. It's about as minimal as an RPG can get.

Here are some tips (since there's no manual):

  • Defeat the Golem to unlock the Valley. 
  • Look around for secret areas. 
  • Some enemies are extremely difficult until you maim a particular part of their body.
  • Save often!

This is a much-needed remake of MansterSoft's second game "Paladin's Quest". The original can still be downloaded on the MansterSoft website (you'll need DOSBox to run it).

To keep up with MansterSoft's updates, follow @MansterSoft.
